textBox.richText: New paper on Anti-Spoofing with Kinect

A new paper accepted for publication at BTAS 2013: N. Erdogmus and S. Marcel. Spoofing in 2d face recognition with 3d masks and anti-spoofing with Kinect. In IEEE Sixth International Conference on Biometrics: Theory, Applications and Systems, 2013. Pdf: http://publications.idiap.ch/downloads/papers/2013/Erdogmus_BTAS_2013.pdf Source code: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/maskattack.lbp Data: https://www.idiap.ch/dataset/3dmad Congratulations to Nesli.
New paper on Anti-Spoofing with Kinect at BTAS 2013
